# NrcSetWallConductanceByNecbClimateZone

## Description
Modifies wall conductances by NECB climate zone.

## Modeler Description
Modifies wall conductances by NECB climate zone. Minimum OpenStudio 2.8.1; NRCan branch of standards (October 2019).

## Measure Type
ModelMeasure

## Taxonomy
